explanation: Use "!help" to view an explanation for the various functions of HighscoresBot. Use "!help [command]" to view an explanation for that command.
Outputs the front page of Vidyascape's Experience Tracker. Options: Daily, Weekly, Monthly.
Displays a Vidyascape user's experience and levels. Usage: !stats [user].
Displays the most recent patchnotes for /v/scape.
HighscoresBot will measure and output the time it takes in milliseconds to receive a response from its server.
How long the bot has been online.
Outputs a link for various landings on the vidyascape.org website.
Gives a link to the current thread.
